page.title: 16Blaen-y-Maes
page.content: Blaen-y-maes seems to offer little for young people.This may explain the ugly appearance of the area.There is much vandalism,graffiti and litter throughout the area. Blaen-y-maes School has wire mesh windows and the roof is also covered with wire.Many buildings in the area have been vandalised.Some houses are cared for but many are neglected and untidy.Many stray dogs and horses roam the area. There is a new police station next to Blaen-y-maes.Burglaries are common, so many extra police patrol the area. Many people believe that if more facilities were provided for young people there would be less vandalism and fewer burglaries. The local council have been trying to find ways of improving this area.
